text: Arthur Clifford "Cliff" Michelmore (11 December 1919 - 16 March 2016)Screenonline was an English television presenter and producer. He was best known for the BBC television programme Tonight, which he presented from 1957 to 1965. Michelmore died on 16 March 2016 in a hospital in Hampshire, England at the age of 96.Cliff Michelmore Dies Aged 96 - BBC News ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2016 deaths Category:BBC television presenters Category:English television presenters Category:English television producers Category:People from the Isle of Wight
title: Cliff Michelmore
